title: When trying to charge my phone with the provided USB C wall charger, my phone won't charge.
content:
I believe that this is because under Settings > USB Preferences > USB Controlled By, the option "Connected device" is selected instead of "This device". When I try and select "This device", the phone begins to charge. Every time I connect the charger I was asked to select the usb preference.
Please advise how to resolve the issue.
